name: Homemade_Muesli
desc: Homemade Muesli with things you have in your pantry. The best of all this will have a better taste that Muesli from the shops

directions: Heat oven to 180Â°C. Line a 13 x 18 1-inch baking tray with baking paper
Add the oats, coconut and almonds together in a large bowl
Whisk together the oil and honey
Pour the liquid mixture over the oat mixture and stir with a wooden spoon until all the oats and nuts are coated
Pour it onto the baking tray. Bake, stirring occasionally with a spatula, until the mixture turns a nice even golden brown.
Remove the granola mixture from the oven en allow to cool down, stirring occasionaly
Add the rest of the ingredients and mix through the granola
Store the cooled muesli in an airtight container
